transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Helllo.
Hello.
Executive: Haan, am I having a word with Anvi Tech?
Customer: Uh, yes sir, tell me.
Executive: Yeah, my name is Anil Prakash. I am calling you from IndiaMART. Actually, you had raised a concern that you are not receiving calls from your account manager, right?
Customer: Uh, you are from IndiaMART?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Okay, haan, tell me sir.
Executive: Ma'am, you requested for a call back, right?
Customer: Uh, yes sir, tell me. Yes sir, yes sir.
Executive: Tell me, tell me ma'am, what help do you need?
Customer: Okay, we are getting the leads of only hose pipes, not gas safety devices.
Executive: Gas safety device you are not receiving leads?
Customer: Yeah, only the, two to three days we got only uh, hose pipe leads only sir.
Executive: Which, which leads do you need ma'am?
Customer: We need gas safety device leads sir.
Executive: Gas safety device?
Customer: Yeah. Gas safety device.
We got from two days back we got hose pipe.
From two days back sir, we are getting the hose pipe leads. Yesterday we got some gas safety device leads sir.
Executive: Okay, let me check.
Just a minute, I'm looking at the keywords and everything so that I can improve this, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Anvi Tech, gas safety device, safety device.
Ma'am see, if you need more uh, safety device uh, order na, right? Gas safety device.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: What, what I will do is, I have more categories which are gas securer, gas safety device, ESI gas safety device, home gas safety device, right? These are the four different categories that we have. Okay?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: So I'm going to add these uh, in your uh, product as well so that you start receiving more leads. Is that fine?
Customer: Okay. Okay sir.
Executive: Right ma'am?
Customer: You change the names of those products sir?
Executive: No ma'am, I'm adding new keywords. So currently your profile has, yes, so that you will receive more gas safety device leads. Okay? Actually the problem is that these are few different uh, brand as well, right? So you will get those brand leads as well. You will call them and you will convince them to buy your product, right? That is fine for you?
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: Right? Okay ma'am, so I will add four different other keywords so that you start receiving more uh, this uh, gas safety device.
Customer: Okay sir. Okay.
Executive: Now tell me sir ma'am, any other problem that you are facing apart from this?
Customer: Apart from this nothing sir.
Executive: Apart from this nothing, right?
Customer: Uh, yeah, only the leads issue was only gas safety device only we work upon only gas safety device. Presently hose pipes are not available to provide them.
Executive: Okay, you don't have any stock for that?
Customer: Uh, yeah, we don't have stock so we have stopped providing that.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Yeah, and only we take the business leads.
Executive: Haan haan, that is fine ma'am.
Customer: Yeah, one one lead which will be there of gas, yeah.
Executive: There is one category which is gas saver.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: So you deal in gas saver as well ma'am?
Customer: Gas saver, yes sir, that is also comes under safety device only.
Executive: That also comes into safety device only na? Okay, I have added that as well ma'am, that category as well.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Uh, okay. Just a minute. I'm just looking at what other uh, different categories we can add so that you start receiving better response, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. So I have added gas safety device. I have added gas securer, gas safety device, okay?
Home gas safety device. Then uh, gas saver as well ma'am, I have added.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, these are the new categories that I have added. You will start receiving better response on this.
Customer: Okay, the leads were not coming no sir, so any issue of that leads are not came only?
Executive: Ma'am, uh, say, ma'am, you use the services on laptop or on a mobile?
Customer: Mobile sir.
Executive: On mobile. So ma'am, on mobile go and click on buyleads, right? After clicking on buyleads, you will see that there is an uh, on the right hand side, there are three dots, right hand top side.
Customer: Yeah. Haan.
Executive: Click on three dots. When you will see there is an option of past leads.
Customer: Past leads.
Executive: Yes, click on that one.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Click on and then select your uh, gas safety device.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay ma'am, just you will see few other leads, there are few leads. Just mark I am interested, right?
Customer: Okay sir, I will check it.
Executive: Done ma'am. Okay. So please tell me ma'am, I will wait for you. Any other issue that you are facing?
Customer: Uh, no sir.
Executive: No ma'am?
Customer: No ma'am.
Executive: Okay ma'am. So I'll I'll I'll share you the details from your uh, work space as well, right? What are the uh, new categories that I have added and you can contact me back. Actually Harshita is on leave, right? Harshita is on a leave for uh, this week. So that's why she is not able to take your call. By meanwhile she is not on the office, I'll help you to coordinate with your position. Okay?
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Done ma'am. Ma'am, please uh, I'll share you a email as well for the feedback of this call and everything. Do mention what positive.
Thank you. Okay sir.
Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving gas safety device leads.

- Only receiving hose pipe leads.



Resolution:

- Added gas safety device categories to profile.

- Provided steps to check past leads on mobile.

- Informed about account manager's leave.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share details via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gas safety device, leads, categories
